channel.title: MoparChat
channel.description:
Well alot of people have trouble joining the IRC so I just made a website with a chat box.
People will rember it better as it is just a plain site.
[url=http://www.freewebs.com/moparchat]MoparChat Channle #1 on FW - Main Channle[/url] 24/7 Hosting [url=http://www.freewebs.com/chatchannles]MoparChat Channles #2-5 On FW[/url]

item.title: MoparChat
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:15, topic:187388”]Lol freewebs chatbox??[/quote]It’s not freewebs chat box. It was made in HTML. [quote=“davidude36, post:16, topic:187388”]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/godamn.jpg

Godamn i need to get ad block pro…[/quote]
Lol off topic? Here in the U.S. theres a commerical about a website to pair up with gay men. /offtopic

-I think this would make a great add.

Edit:New channles have been added there is a total of 5.

Look back at the top of the first post.

item.title: MoparChat
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“spankjava, post:11, topic:187388”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=249995.msg2096276#msg2096276 date=1205020994]

Help what? there is never anyone complaining about no being able to join irc.
[/quote]Yes there are

No there is not, only when there is problems with the actual server which are normally fixed.

Dude you don’t have to get all pissed. The first 10 times I tried joining I couln’t do it. Dang

thats why theres a guide on joining :/[/quote]I would think a site would be much more easier and way SIMPLER but if mopar dosen’t need it it’s fine.
In case mopar wants to check it out

MoparChat On Freewebs

Read full topic
